data.oai_dc:dc: OCNMS: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Cape Elizabeth, Washington, USA (CE100)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Cape Elizabeth, Washington, USA, by OCNMS. Measurements were collected using a StowAway Tidbit Temperature Logger (Onset Computer Corp. TBI32-05+37) beginning 2006-05-30. The instrument depth was 099 meters, in an overall water depth of 100 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
